application.doc: Retrieving a list of configuration file component paths

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve list of configuration file component paths
method.doc: To retrieve a list of all the advanced configuration file component paths with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the advanced configuration files resource URI. Note that by adding a recursive=true query parameter, this will retrieve a list of all components and files recursively.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: advancedConfigComponentsListJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the configuration component directory.

param.name: type
param.doc: Specifies that this element is a directory.

param.name: version
param.doc: The current version of directory. This information is the last modified time of the directory. A numerical number that indicates the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).
